abstract.t: This document proposes a router affiliation protocol for IPv6-over-(foo)-over-IPv4 links, where (foo) is either an encapsulatinglayer (e.g., UDP) or a NULL layer. It is essentially a lightweight,link-layer mechanism for nodes and routers to establish securityassociations, discover and dynamically re-adjust maximum transmissionunits, and detect router failures. The protocol makes no attempt toensure reliable message delivery; this function is performed byhigher-layer protocols, e.g. TCP.
